Description:
This is a story of murder and deceit, where the fate of humanity at stake. Darkstar - is a race against time to find a way to reverse it. Your journey begins in the ship sank many light years from Earth, in a world that was destroyed centuries ago, but have extensive experience in search and intelligence. You are the captain John O'Neil (Clive Robertson), and were in a spaceship Westwick, but can not remember what happened and not even know who you are. But things are likely to mislead, despite the cold silence ... You are not alone. Darkstar will give you plenty of hours of online movies and adventure, and the original cast of Mystery Science Theater 3000, along with music and sound progressive MetalWorx. In addition, this final presentation of the great Peter Graves. This game disk images (more than 13 hours.) Darkstar - an interactive world with live actors.
